title: Online Mathematics Leadership: Inclusive Collaborative Learning Design Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts and project management experience
context.additional_context: Learners from diverse backgrounds collaborate in a BYOD environment to solve practical math problems

learning_goals: Learners can design inclusive online mathematics education reflecting diverse learner needs with over 80% accuracy
Learners can establish knowledge-sharing processes among large teams using design pattern-based collaborative learning
Learners can measure PBL process outcomes using data-driven assessment tools with rubrics of at least three levels
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
